Instance.description: Represents a single STC relationship track.

Tunable.name: decay_to_initial_modifier
Tunable.description: If True, this track will converge to the tested modifier calculated at the time the sims last left a social group.

Tunable.name: socialization_decay_modifier
Tunable.description: A multiplier to apply to the decay rate if the two Sims that this relationship track applies to are socializing.
